node.title: Can We Know the Year of Jesus' Second Coming?
node.description: Adventists are setting new dates for Jesus' Second Coming: 2016, 2022, 2030, 2031, and the list goes on. Let's face it - They cannot all be right. Can we know the date or the year? Also check out this thorough study: http://www.empowermissions.org/jesus-second-coming-in-2031-conspiracy-victor-sanvicens/
